website_summaries.verdict: Meant as a "starter" camera, this is robust enough to stick with you until you decide you need something more advanced.
pros: Just like the HERO, but with WiFi and Bluetooth enabled

website_summaries.verdict: A good value from one of the top names in action cameras. If you have your heart set on a GoPro but are on a slightly limited budget, this is one to consider.
pros: Capable of shooting 1080p/60 images that have beautiful colors and contrasts
Has built-in WiFi that makes sharing easy
One of the less pricey models by the brand
cons: Some cameras had batteries that failed to hold long charge times, and a few wouldn't turn on and/or off on occasion

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect GoPro for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect GoPro for beginners. The LCD touch is simple to use and also you can connect to the GoPro App or GoPro Remote Control. The battery is attached inside the camera (it don't remove), but you can use an external battery connecting in the back of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend you NOT purchase one or any GoPro because they ...
customer_reviews.text: In less than one year the battery will not hold a charge and GoPro has discontinued the model so they will not replace the battery. Their offer is to buy another unit at 20% off. I highly recommend you NOT purchase one or any GoPro because they are not Professionals at standing behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: bird

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it. I have it helmet mounted
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for a long time, more than a year. I don't like it. I have it helmet mounted. Even if I stop and turn the camera on, get the WIFI and Bluetooth connected to my phone, then when I am a point that I want to record my ride, pressing the button to start the recording does not always get me the record function to work. Bust mode, single photo ETC. Just not easy when I'm riding. Go Pro needs to make this camera a lot more user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Lente Loquito

customer_reviews.title: My unit's battery lost it's ability to retain juice in ...
customer_reviews.text: My unit's battery lost it's ability to retain juice in a couple of months and the SD card keeps getting full because the looping option does not work even though it's on! I can't replace the battery because GoPro says it's not user replaceable (though it's really a simple procedure) and they won't sell it to me. I can't find a replacement battery online either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... action camera as a gift for Christmas (an Amazon best seller) and was wholly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had received a competitor action camera as a gift for Christmas (an Amazon best seller) and was wholly disappointed. The previous camera had terrible battery life, unfriendly user interface and the associated phone app was worthless. This GoPro is not the most current but gives plenty of value. Shoots great pictures and video. Has good battery life and the phone app can control the entire camera. Camera connects and maintains a strong WiFi signal. There is a reason GoPro camera cost more than their competitors, it's because they are worth every extra cent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby was very happy when he opened this on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.text: Hubby was very happy when he opened this on Christmas morning. He's still "learning" and is an offshore boat captain. He wants to show the family what he does for a living. I think we will all end up seasick!!
customer_reviews.author: DDuncan

customer_reviews.title: We used one of GoPro templates and it turned out awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model for my ten year old daughter and we used the free editing software and had a movie made within a few hours. There is definitely a learning curve on the software, but a little patience, which I don't have much of, will propel you to movie making. She is thrilled and can't stop watching her own movie. We used one of GoPro templates and it turned out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Newman

customer_reviews.title: A Fabulous Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the husband of the account holder. Hey, for the money, this is fabulous. The only thing I don't like is that the FPS are limited. But hey, it's got Wifi, so you can see what the camera sees on your mobile phone. VERY handy.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hare

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work properly. It lacked the advertised accessories of the curved mount, touch backdoor, and skeleton backdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper96

customer_reviews.title: I have had no problems and really enjoy/ feel better having it
customer_reviews.text: I have this side mounted on my LS2 modular motorcycle helmet. I have had no problems and really enjoy/ feel better having it. Had it in the river while playing. Only gripe I would have is there is no real good place to teether it. I ran fishing line through the door hinge to a loop in my helmet lining. Still working on a better set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed. It takes good video and pics
customer_reviews.text: battery don't last too long, a little disappointed. It takes good video and pics, small compact just wished you could put batteries in it to have it all the time
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: Think it's pretty great. Battery is not good though
customer_reviews.text: Think it's pretty great. Battery is not good though, especially if using Wi-Fi. I think i got an hour, maybe a little more on a full charge, when I took it to Mammoth. I now turn the Wi-Fi off when recording and it last a little longer. It doesn't seem you can buy a battery for this particular model though, does anyone have any tips on how they get multiple hours of use, instead of a single hour?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Read the description before buying so that you know what you are getting. It is excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Riegardt S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything i need and more
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. This is my 2nd gopro. I got this for the ability to edit and delete on the go.this and the hero+ are both Bluetooth enabled so you can edit/delete and change the settings from your phone. Only difference is the screen and price. Either one would be good.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our GoPro. We took it on our Carribean Cruise in February and had a blast with it. We took amazing pictures and videos while scuba diving, snorkeling, riding the jet ski. Easy to use for us middle-agers who are not so tech-savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, which ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, which was risky because she's not a real "techie" person... She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Gene W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and video
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures and video, however, it likes to shut off randomly and not turn back on. Missed some great shots because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Long

customer_reviews.title: Great video in all conditions
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product and takes great videos and pictures. We brought it to Maui with us and used it under water a number of times and it performed reliably. It helps to have a video screen so we can review the images right away and confirm we have what we want.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Capture action while it's happening!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's 20 birthday and he is in LOVE! I also purchased a suction cup to record from the side of his race car. Uploading the videos were easy enough. I definitely love GoPro products.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A.

customer_reviews.title: I like this unit but I'm not crazy about the batter ...
customer_reviews.text: My first venture into GoPro cameras. I like this unit but I'm not crazy about the batter life. Not terrible but not swap-able. Video quality seems great. I DO love the ability to use my Android phone to remote into the camera. Great for framing the shot and the LCD is great for that also.
customer_reviews.author: S.L. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: It's a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It's cheaper so it doesn't have all the bells and whistles, but as my first go at GoPro, I am not overwhelmed but them. Didn't realize I couldn't hook an external mic to this model.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: I had the camera for two months and the battery won't hold a charge anymore and I've only used it once
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Oñate

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this device. I have only had it two months and only used it a handful of times and now it won't work. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: We love our GoPro
customer_reviews.text: We love our GoPro! Have had a blast using in many different applications. I will say that we found the Bluetooth feature to cause serious video lag so we don't use and hope that the shot comes out right.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Enders

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift a year ago. Working great. Get lots of memory on your micro SD card as HD video takes up lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for entry level
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get into the GoPro era without breaking the bank. Used on the slopes and never had any issues with battery drain, captured great video of course, and was great to have LCD to review things.
customer_reviews.author: Surfmly

customer_reviews.title: Low grade video and audio quality
customer_reviews.text: As a cyclist, i needed something that can track events on the road. The video output is too poor to give me the quality i need. I wish i knew this before i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buckner

customer_reviews.title: ... is very glitchy and GoPro's customer service is absolute crap. I took this on my trip to San ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very glitchy and GoPro's customer service is absolute crap. I took this on my trip to San Diego, all of the media was wiped off of the SD card and the camera barely works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Those Not Ready for the GoPro 4 Silver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a GoPro 4 Silver, but that is not what is aiming to be. Simpler controls and a more responsive LCD screen make this camera great for beginners and people on a budget. I would highly recommend this over the HERO.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Shakour

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Wish it could capture pictures while taking video though!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera and great video of course! I just wish it was able to capture pictures while taking video. I know some other models offer that option, but this camera was best suited for our activities. Other than that, I have not had any issues!
customer_reviews.author: JamieOM

customer_reviews.title: Use this for its intended purposes!
customer_reviews.text: This GoPro doesnt come out of the casing, which I feel makes my photos look a little blurry. Wishing I would have gone with a DSLR, as this isnt a multi use camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great value, much less than retail store
customer_reviews.text: Great value, much less than retail store. Easy to use phone app easy to use with wifi. I have used at the shooting range, setting the camera at the target and checking targets from my phone
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Used once, and now only turns on and off quickly. Called numerous times to GoPro Support only to hold for hours..... Purchased for my sons birthday present.......stuck with it as a paperweight until GoPro can handle its call volume.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Rock

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: We were only able to use the camera one time in Hawaii. Since then it won't recognize the card nor will it hold a charge. Very disappointed in this product. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Like, the fins that connect every mount or accessory
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the case is built into the camera. If anything in the case breaks. Like, the fins that connect every mount or accessory. My son fell while videoing and broke of all the finds. It's now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Fav purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a two week trip to Japan and so happy I had it. Also in Hawaii. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This camera is super easy to use. This was my first go pro ever and I am in love with it. I love to travel and take videos with my friends when I surf or snowboard and this camera has not disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera so far...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, app is very useful to me. Just play with it and read instructions from gopro website to,learn to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken my go pro all over the world. I just don’t know how to review the photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: D. Home

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter camera. Just wish it had a removable battery so I can swap it out with a new one when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Will stop working
customer_reviews.text: The camera wouldn't stop turning off and on We had to return it.at least it was good while it lasted.BTW it lasted 4 days
customer_reviews.author: María Elena

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: It's an good camera bit after 5 months my battery stopped hold charge and it's won't turn on Not to mention I can't find an replacement battery online ....

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This refurbished camera also went bad do not buy refurbished

customer_reviews.title: ... take it on my scuba dives but that looks like it will never happen im so upset
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this go pro and as i soon i started to test it to see how it works the camera kept saying camera busy and then when i tried to take a picture or record i wouldnt do either the capture button stopped working i just liiterally just opened it i wanted to take it on my scuba dives but that looks like it will never happen im so upset
customer_reviews.author: Nakeito

customer_reviews.title: ... entry level model the picture and video quality are better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Being a entry level model the picture and video quality are better than I thought! Very glad I decided to get the LCD screen model, much easier. One of the three back doors doesn't really fit but overall love this!
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: fun, easy and super cool Vacations can be filmed ...
customer_reviews.text: fun, easy and super cool Vacations can be filmed like never before.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T. Tuccori

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The video part of the camera never worked. I had the right SD card in and it was properly updated and on the right settings. i bought it for a trip and wasn't able to use it so i never got to make my video for the trip. Do not buy a go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this years ago. It's easy to use, light weight and has incredible picture quality. and the price is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Sgurgola

customer_reviews.title: Could be better...
customer_reviews.text: It works ok, as expected, however, the fact that you cannot replace the outter case is a bummer, as any scratch to the outter lens will render the equipment deficient. Also, it needed to have an external battery... I knew about these features when I bought the camera, but I could not have anticipated how much of a hurdle those would be. I'm satisfied overall, but not that much when we are talking about an item that costs +200 USD...
customer_reviews.author: RMarioni

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son loves this! Pairs with the IPAD app! He learned how to do this and functions it on his own! Even better!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Pictures are okay
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Pictures are okay. I have had a lot of fun with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no issues and a lot of fun to use
customer_reviews.text: We got the HERO+ as a wedding present and too it with us on our honeymoon. Absolutely no issues and a lot of fun to use! If you enjoy very active outdoor activities this is a must! :)
customer_reviews.author: ABatteryBunny

customer_reviews.title: After watching her use it and enjoy it so much I'm thinking of getting myself one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. After watching her use it and enjoy it so much I'm thinking of getting myself one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. I love this so much. I use it all the time. Great video quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't put it down since he got it. He was hesitant the first time he tried it under water and now he doesn't swim without it. Great product, well made, and works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: By far this was an awesome purchase. Battery works well, playback looks awesome. Easy to set up to computer. Very very durable. Not laggy, easy to record.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer RN

customer_reviews.title: Screen is amazing to use and quality is unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: Screen is amazing to use and quality is unbeatable. Recommend getting a lot of accesories (tripod, selfie stick, grip clip)
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Like

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera...but you already knew that. Would be better if the battery was replaceable, but that is a GoPro issue.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend getting the GoPro with the LCD
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled with this one. I would definitely recommend getting the GoPro with the LCD. It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: peggy fullmer

customer_reviews.title: he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son that loves taking pictures and videos..he loved it..it was easy to use. He could automatically see what he is taking pics and videos oof on the lCD screen.. great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TexCal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful GoPro camera. Thanks so much for offering this online for sale. Andrew Sitterle
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S. Sitterle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to mm Son in Law... He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Used it on two trips and it cracked on the second trip; it was barely used. It was not abused but utilized as intended, as an action type device, treated in a similar manner as other electronic devices. If the newer product, with the replaceable case is better, DONT SELL THIS INFERIOR PRODUCT. Not happy with GoPro customer service - they should have been able to service their own product at a nominal cost, especially since it is within the warranty period and NOT ABUSED. Customer retention or loyalty doesn't seem like a priority......and there are a lot of competitive products out there that are much less expensive. Seems like this fad will fade
customer_reviews.author: KenW

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a handful of times for work videos. It works for awhile then locks up. Meaning doesn't record, take photos, and won't turn off. I took it on a snorkel trip recently and it locked up and ruined my trip because I missed out on taking great underwater video. Buying a new 4K knock off go pro on here for $79.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swan

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to go to Jamaica. My husband ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go to Jamaica. My husband was able to get a video of a lion fish when we went snorkeling. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is obessed! Too many awesome qualities to list.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Leach

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple of months and it is so cool!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a couple of months and it is so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this camera...
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this camera. I have used this on and off for over a year... and it finally gave up the ghost and will not read a micro SD card for anything. These cameras use to be pretty high quality... but mine actually came apart while using it... from the back.. and I had to push the screen back into place. Now... Dec 1, 2016... this camera is continues to reboot... as what plagues a lot of GoPro cameras. Feel free too look that one fact up. Stay away and get a cheaper camera... fairly inexpensive and works just a good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as usual on GoPro products
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as usual on GoPro products. My only doubt is related to the battery. If the camera cannot be unmounted from the case, it could be a problem in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift to my adult son who is an avid kayaker. He absolutely loves the camera and sends videos via internet. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I didn't work. The camera would not stay on to take any pictures. I sent it back for a credit
customer_reviews.author: Don P Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect "Point-and-Shoot" camcorder
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect "Point-and-Shoot" camcorder. I used it to film a company informational video, and couldn't be happier with the results. The one area that was lacking was the audio capabilities; this specific model lacks most (if not all) compatibility with audio recording accessories. This is unfortunate, as you are limited to the units built-in recording hardware, which lacks ambient filtering and noise reduction. Other than that, the Hero+ LCD is perfect for capturing action, motion and time-lapse, while also having great battery life. Note that the unit will get hot if shooting for extended periods of time, but was better when using the open backdoor. I am pleased with my purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aric

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Really great gift for teens. The picture and sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: j.koszy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck, if you don't need 4k quality this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Momo2012

customer_reviews.title: great go pro with view screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome go pro and it has a display to let you know what you are recording and works great
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, but no where near any of the other Hero cameras
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised, but be aware that the picture quality drop off btw this and the Hero3, 4 or 5 cameras is substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Great for spear fishing and sport shooting.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic at it's highest resolution setting and battery life is excellent. Wish I had known it was going to drop $100 a few weeks after purchase. Took it past 25 feet spearfishing. The wide angle lens is also perfect for sports shooting. It picks up my weapon and shot placement. GoPro has solidified their name in my book.
customer_reviews.author: C. Karam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old grandson rides BMX bikes! He loves this!

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget is wonderful I'm still learning about it because I just got ...
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is wonderful I'm still learning about it because I just got it but so far definitely five stars I'm having a lot of fun with it I even ordered the hardest for my dog I can't wait for that to come this Ohta be interesting I've ordered quite a few other things to go with it for when I'm out and about on my scooter I think it's going to get some good video and good pictures I'll let you know and when I get pictures and video I'll post so far everything's great love it
customer_reviews.author: Bernice S.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome camera. The only downside is the built-in case
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera. The only downside is the built-in case. The Go-Pro camera doesn't come out and you can't take out the battery. The LCD screen is awesome, and the wifi is perfect to connect to your smartphone!
customer_reviews.author: pxk140

customer_reviews.title: But hoping it will be useful when snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew it didn't zoom before I purchased it! But hoping it will be useful when snorkeling.

customer_reviews.title: It is just fine, good resolution
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say?... It is just fine, good resolution, good looking, nice handling...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but stretches photos horizontally due to the wide angle lenses and the video is washed out in color.
customer_reviews.text: We just used this for the first time on vacation to take underwater video during snorkeling. We got some awesome shots and were able to easily upload it to YouTube. We did not take advantage of the wireless features, because we have a MicroSD adapter, which is much faster with 2+GB of files/videos. The videos look great but are a bit washed out in color, IMO. The photos have the right amount of coloring, however the lens is a wide angle lens that very noticeably stretches the photos horizontally near the edges. For the size and ability to abuse this moderately, it's a good price, but some of the photos were nearly not useable because of the stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Bendy (Ben and Randy)

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Early!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived almost a week early! So far everything works as required!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never had more fun underwater I took amazing photos with this camera and ...
customer_reviews.text: Never had more fun underwater I took amazing photos with this camera and my children are enjoying it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, excellent customer service & fast shipping! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Its go pro. With the right mounts I can take video anywhere.

customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice hands free camera - we will give it the full use when we go to Florida!

customer_reviews.title: son is enjoying using it in Hawaii and friends
customer_reviews.text: son is enjoying using it in Hawaii and friends too

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my daughter. See loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Indeed it does
customer_reviews.text: Like most things you get what you pay for. If you truly want the backside display then this is for you. I think that you might not use it as much as you think you would therefore one of the other GoPro models might be better for you. Since this was my first GoPro I've learned that it has some features I don't need and some that I would like. Does it meet it's advertised objectives? Indeed it does. It's all about personal preferences after that.

customer_reviews.text: I've been doing time-lapse with this thing and its great!

customer_reviews.text: purchased to use on several vacations used twice and it has now stopped recording video and taking pictures

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I wanted the GoPro with the LCD so I could see what I was shooting and I don't regret it for a second. I also wanted the waterproof option, which this came prepared to do. There are different backs that you can change out to make the LCD screen easier to use, or to make the whole camera waterproof. I also purchased the floating handle and case for the GoPro and everything fits and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love the wide angle and the different options for filming
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide angle and the different options for filming. Works great when you use a proper sd card. Don't use a knock off brand card, they won't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: K Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Spent several days taping great white sharks and the Hero + LCD performed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time on a dive trip to Guadalupe Island off the coast of Mexico. Spent several days taping great white sharks and the Hero + LCD performed perfectly. Having an LCD screen for diving is mandatory if one wants good results. The instant on feature with the shutter is also also invaluable. Highly recommended for all except those who want the ultimate in resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Evacuee

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. However, the plastic mount under the camera broke after minimal use. I'm pretty disappointed, but hope that GoPro will honor the warranty since its been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel buddy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE carrying my GoPro with me to do vlogs and for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Chow

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. Much easier then ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Much easier then the earlier versions. Definitely more cost effective since it came standard with the LCD display.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Piro

product_meta.title: GoPro Camera HERO+ LCD HD Video Recording Camera
product_meta.description:
Capture incredible moments and relive them on the spot. HERO+ LCD delivers 1080p60 video and 8MP photos, and features the convenience of a touch display. Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connect to the GoPro App for shot preview, total camera control and easy content sharing to Instagram, Facebook, and more.

SET CONTAINS:
• HERO+ LCD Camera with Built-in Touch Display • Integrated Housing3 • Built-In Battery3 • Skeleton Backdoor • Touch Backdoor • Curved Adhesive Mount • Flat Adhesive Mount • Quick Release Buckle • Micro USB Cable
feature_bullets: HERO+ LCD Camera with Built in Touch Display
Records stunning, immersive 1080p60 and 720p60 video with built in video trimming, SuperView, Auto Low Light, HI Light Tag and Quick Capture
Captures 8MP single, Time Lapse and Burst photos up to 5 fps
Built In Wi Fi + Bluetooth enables connectivity to the GoPro App or Smart Remote1 to adjust modes and settings, control the camera remotely, and view and share your content
Durable + Waterproof to 131’ (40m), designed to withstand extreme environments and conditions
